text: læw rea cung di kriw phwk khea læa laxnat phwk khea neuxngdwy kar thi phwk khea thalay sayya khxng phwk khea læa ptiseth brrda xongkar khx ngxallxhˌ læa kha br rda nabi doy prascak khwam pen thrrm læa kar thi phwk khea klaw wa hawcı khxng rea mi peluxk hum xyu hamidi xallxhˌ di thrng prathabtra bn hawcı khxng phwk khea tanghak neuxngcak kar ptiseth sraththa khxng phwk khea dangnan phwk khea cung mi sraththa kan nxkcak pheiyng leknxy theanan
